forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered rain showers. Cloudy, with a low around 58. Southeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Scattered Rain Showers then Patchy Fog
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered rain showers before 8am, then patchy fog and isolated rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 69. Southeast wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

weather_report:
As the darkness of night clings to Boston like a well-worn coat, the city is draped in a quiet veil of scattered rain showers. The air is cool and moist, whispering hints of the day to come. By dawn, when the sun prepares to break free from the horizon, it will usher in patchy fog and intermittent rain—offers of a tranquil, yet somewhat drizzly Thursday. A low around fifty-eight offers a gentle embrace, and as the day unfurls, temperatures will creep towards a high of nearly sixty-nine, tempered by a soft, southeast wind.

The cobblestone streets, glistening from earlier rains, invite an early morning stroll, though one might want to be adorned in layers, favoring light fabrics that allow for transition as the day grows warmer yet remains shrouded in clouds. A breezy, light rain jacket will be your steadfast companion, ready to shield you from the lingering mist. As the hours pass, mild and muted light will dim the vibrancy of colors—but perhaps it invites a certain introspective charm, perfect for finding solace in a cozy café, savoring a warm cup of coffee while watching life swirl past outside. 

When lunch beckons, a light bite in the company of close friends, or a visit to a local bookstore could unfold into an afternoon of quiet pleasures, where one can enjoy the rhythm of the rain outside mingling with the soft hum of conversation within. As you navigate the day, the subtle, damp aromas of the earth rise with the fog, reminding you that even the cloudiest days can offer a gentler kind of beauty, like a mellow sonnet carried on the breeze.
